resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75945</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75945</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ff8c7ebe-79a9-4d82-bd1b-a9294c7f48cf#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Óriás panda</string>
            <string language="en">Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Panda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Panda</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ázsiai bambuszerdők lakója, fő tápláléka a bambusz. Erősen veszélyeztetett faj. A medvefélék közé tartozik.</string>
            <string language="en">Panda lives in Asian bamboo forest and its main food is bamboo. Panda is considerably endangered species. It belongs to ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  ragadozók,  Kína,  bambusz,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammalian, placentalia, carnivores, Chuna, bamboo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Panda lebt im asiatischen Bambuswald und seine 
Hauptnahrung ist Bambus. Panda ist beträchtlich gefährdete 
Sorte. Er gehört ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le panda vit dans la forêt en bambou asiatique 
et sa nourriture principale est en bambou. Le panda est des 
espèces considérablement mises en danger. Il appartient 
aux ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O panda vive na floresta de bambu asian e seu 
alimento principal é de bambu. O panda é espécie 
consideravelmente posta em perigo. Pertence aos ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il panda vive in foresta di bambù asiatica ed il 
relativo alimento principale è di bambù. Il panda è specie 
considerevolmente in pericolo. Appartiene ai ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Panda ζει στο ασιατικό δάσος μπαμπού και τα 
βασικά τρόφιμά του είναι μπαμπού. Το Panda είναι 
αρκετά απειλούμενο υπό εξαφάνιση είδος. Ανήκει στα 
ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El panda vive en bosque de bambú asiático y su 
alimento principal es de bambú. El panda es especie 
considerablemente puesta en peligro. Pertenece a los ursidae.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetier-, placentalia, fleischfressende Tiere, Chuna, Bambus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifère, placentalia, carnivores, Chuna, bambou</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mammalian, placentalia, carnivores, Chuna, bambu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammifero, placentalia, carnivori, Chuna, bambù</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαστοφόρος, placentalia, carnivores, Chuna, μπαμπού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamífero, placentalia, carnívoros, Chuna, bambú</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75945</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=ff8c7ebe-79a9-4d82-bd1b-a9294c7f48cf&v=1&b=2</uri>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
